span.span: The namespace provides classes and interfaces that support queries that use Language-Integrated Query (LINQ).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Die Namespace befindet sich in der System.Core-Assembly (in "System.Core.dll").The namespace is in the System.Core assembly (in System.Core.dll).
